mapper.select: select c.salesmanName ,c.clientCode ,ci.for_short,ci.full_name,COUNT(c.clientCode) as sumCount,MAX(c.time) as maxTime from clock c inner join client_info ci on c.clientCode = ci.code where c.userId=#{userId} and c.clientCode is not null and c.clientCode !='' and c.time between #{beginTime} and #{endTime} group by c.clientCode,c.salesmanName,ci.full_name,ci.for_short having COUNT(c.clientCode)>0
